contentrichtext.text: '''K-car''' may refer to: *[[Chevrolet C/K]], Chevrolet and GMC's full-size pickup truck line from 1962 until 1998 *[[Chrysler K platform]], an automobile platform **Of which the [[Dodge Aries]] and [[Plymouth Reliant]] were generically referred to as K-cars because of the platform and the K insignia *[[Kei car]], a Japanese category of small automobiles *Informal term for a series of modern trolley cars built for the [[Southeastern Pennsylvania Transportation Authority]] by Kawasaki ==See also== * [[KCAR (disambiguation)]] {{disambig}}
